title: Assassin censor...
body:
I'm currently trying to make an item set for assassin characters however, due to the automatic censoring of the word "ass" it believes the word assassin is inappropriate. The end results looks like this: ******in. This is fairly frustrating and is obviously not purposeful as Riot themselves have categorised champions into an assassin style and is visible within the "types of champions". Its not hurtful to the game play or anything but I just want to name my item preset "assassin" so when I go talon, I know what to build :/

Thanks
